mapper.insert: insert into aug_order (order_id, delivery_id, order_type, cargo_name, cargo_weight, sender_name, sender_address, delivery_address, order_state, sender_tel, consignee, consignee_tel, start_city, midpoint_city, destination_city, transport_price, delivery_price, carriage_price, total_price, vehicle, order_comment ) values (#{order_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delivery_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cargo_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cargo_weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{sender_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delivery_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order_state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender_tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consignee_tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{start_city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midpoint_city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destination_city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transport_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{delivery_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{carriage_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{total_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{vehicle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order_comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update aug_order set delivery_id = #{delivery_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_type = #{order_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cargo_name = #{cargo_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cargo_weight = #{cargo_weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sender_name = #{sender_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sender_address = #{sender_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery_address = #{delivery_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_state = #{order_state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sender_tel = #{sender_tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consignee = #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consignee_tel = #{consignee_tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_city = #{start_city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, midpoint_city = #{midpoint_city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, destination_city = #{destination_city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transport_price = #{transport_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, delivery_price = #{delivery_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, carriage_price = #{carriage_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_price = #{total_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, vehicle = #{vehicle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_comment = #{order_comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where order_id = #{order_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select order_id, delivery_id, order_type, cargo_name, cargo_weight, sender_name, sender_address, delivery_address, order_state, sender_tel, consignee, consignee_tel, start_city, midpoint_city, destination_city, transport_price, delivery_price, carriage_price, total_price, vehicle, order_comment from aug_order where order_id = #{order_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select order_id, delivery_id, order_type, cargo_name, cargo_weight, sender_name, sender_address, delivery_address, order_state, sender_tel, consignee, consignee_tel, start_city, midpoint_city, destination_city, transport_price, delivery_price, carriage_price, total_price, vehicle, order_comment from aug_order
